data.title: Who are Courteney Cox Parents? Meet Richard Lewis Cox and Courteney Bass
data.meta_description: Who are Courteney Cox's Parents? Check this article to know who are Courteney Cox's Parents along with Courteney Cox's biography. Courteney Cox is an American actress and filmmaker.
data.text:
Who are Courteney Cox's Parents?

So who are Courteney Cox's Parents? According to Online Sources, Courteney Cox's Parents are Richard Lewis Cox and Courteney Bass. Courteney Cox is an American actress and filmmaker, born on 15 June 1964.

TRENDING

Who is Courteney Cox?

Courteney Cox, born on June 15, 1964, in Birmingham, Alabama, is a prominent American actress, director, and producer. Renowned for her iconic portrayal of Monica Geller on the beloved sitcom Friends, she has left an indelible mark on the entertainment industry.

How old is Courteney Cox?

Courteney Cox was Born on June 15, 1964, in the vibrant city of Birmingham, Alabama, Courteney Cox radiates timeless beauty and talent. As of 2024, at the age of 59, she continues to captivate audiences worldwide. Her journey from Friends to diverse roles showcases an enduring passion for her craft, inspiring generations.

How tall is Courteney Cox?

Courteney Cox, standing at a statuesque 5 feet 8 inches (1.75 m), possesses both grace and presence. Her well-balanced physique, weighing 63 kg (139 lbs), reflects a commitment to a healthy lifestyle. Cox's height and weight contribute to her timeless elegance, complementing her multifaceted talents in the entertainment industry.

Courteney Cox Nationality

Courteney Cox proudly hails from the United States, making her nationality American. Born on June 15, 1964, in Birmingham, Alabama, she embodies the spirit of American talent and has become a celebrated actress, director, and producer. Cox's contributions to the entertainment industry highlight her dedication to her craft and her home country.

https://www.instagram.com/p/ClWeQG6rgkD/

Courteney Cox Career

Acting:

Best known for portraying Monica Geller in the iconic NBC sitcom Friends.

Featured prominently in the horror film series Scream, as well as the ABC hit Cougar Town.

Diverse roles include appearances in Dirt, Family Ties, The Tripper, and Web Therapy.

Modeling:

Began her career as a model in New York City after high school.

Associated with Warner Bros. Television, Cox graced covers of teen magazines like Tiger Beat and Little Miss.

Worked with renowned brands such as Maybelline, Noxzema, and Tampax.

Courteney Cox Awards and Achievements

2023 MTV Movie Award:

Category: Best Fight

Winning Role: Gale Weathers in Scream VI

2023 OFTA TV Hall of Fame:

Category: OFTA TV Hall of Fame for Actors and Actresses

1997 OFTA Television Award:

Category: Best Ensemble in a Comedy Series

Winning Role: Friends (shared with Jennifer Aniston, Lisa Kudrow, and Matt LeBlanc)

1995 Golden Apple Awards:

Category: Female Discovery of the Year

2000 Teen Choice Award:

Category: Choice Movie: Chemistry

Winning Role: Scream 3
